page.title: 19PLAYTIME SURVEY
page.content: {What do children aged 10 & 11 years {find to do at morning break time at {school?} Number of boys and girls questioned 60. Date 10 Oct.1985. Weather : cool,dry,sunny; time:1015 Those really keen to go outside = 33 Those only fairly keen = 12 Those who preferred to stay in = 15 However, 8 children did stay inside either to do jobs or to practise a musical instrument. For the break,33 children had brought crisps to eat,while 4 had brought fruit and 23 had nothing to eat. For drink,7 had orange squash,20 drank water and 33 had nothing to drink. { Activities}were: standing or sitting chatting - 36; playing games - 16, staying inside school - 8. At sometime during break 8 children felt bored,6 worried about something,3 felt lonely, 1 was chastised,36 were really happy.
